sn30.4-6:1.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn30.4-6:1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena midhekacco kayassa bheda param marana jalabujanam supannanam …pe…
sn30.4-6:1.6: “Idha, bhikkhu, ekacco kayena dvayakari hoti, vacaya dvayakari, manasa dvayakari.
sn30.4-6:1.10: ‘aho vataham kayassa bheda param marana opapatikanam supannanam sahabyatam upapajjeyyan’ti.
sn30.4-6:1.11: So kayassa bheda param marana opapatikanam supannanam sahabyatam upapajjati.
sn30.4-6:1.12: Ayam kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayam paccayo, yena midhekacco kayassa bheda param marana opapatikanam supannanam sahabyatam upapajjati”ti.
